title: On Quality #9 - Section 4 Dharma
description:
While Pirsig didn't focus on his Zen practice as a way of connecting to Quality, it's obvious and explicit in his book that this is how he viewed the path. Zen is one of several mystical paths to a similar "one-ness" of which we participate.
